## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G11220](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G11220)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtELP4, ELO1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ELONGATA 1
- **Description:**   Paxneb protein-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G11220.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G11220.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G11220.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G11220.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [elo1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced organ growth.  Reduced cell proliferation rate.
